title: riot, account was reset
body: hey riot, i was wondering why all of a sudden my account went back to a level ten with no runes masteries or champs i have purchased over the years please help

replies.body: It doesn't look like this account has reached level 30 at any point in time, so I'm wondering if you're referring to a different account that had all of the champions and runes you remember it having. Double check that you're logging into the right account, and if you can't find it, reach out to our account agents in a ticket and they should be able to help you track that other account down.
Send a ticket to Riot Support.
